Request for a base64-encoded unsigned earn redeem transaction to redeem shares

:::note
Refer to [Lend API doc](/docs/lend-api) for more information
:::


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["asset","signer","shares"],"properties":{"asset":{"type":"string"},"signer":{"type":"string"},"shares":{"type":"string"}},"example":{"asset":"EPjFWdd5AufqSSqeM2qN1xzybapC8G4wEGGkZwyTDt1v","signer":"HYbxGkNvEwvZ14RzJHPB9h3dWfXjxwAEhkyzJRHx1hBf","shares":"1000000"},"title":"EarnSharesRequestBody"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
